title: No Filter: The Inside Story of Instagram
author: Sarah Frier
attributes: Discusses the rapid growth of Instagram.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
attributes: Financial literacy means a broad understanding of accounting and investing and knowing the markets and the law.
Each chapter ends with a “Study Session,” which reviews the material and poses questions.

title: Getting to Yes
author: Roger Fisher
William Ury
attributes: Tips on developing a cordial relationship with the other side.
Avoiding the trap of being “nice” and getting walked all over.
